pages.text: An {b aqueduct} is an artificial water canal, and in Convivium, used to convey certain blocks (by default stews, dishes and beverages from Caupona and Convivium).

pages.title: Aqueduct
pages.text: {b Other materials available:} stone bricks, sandstone.

pages.title: Aqueduct Wavemaker
pages.text: {b Other materials available:} stone bricks, sandstone.

Aqueduct multiblock structures are made up by {b aqueduct blocks} and one {b wavemaker block}. The wavemaker block requires {(mechanisms/aeolipile)rotary force} to power the whole structure.;; When powered, moving spray can be seen on the water; and blocks mentioned above, if put above the aqueduct, will be conveyed downstream.
